content:
President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky expects to strengthen our country's strategic opportunities to predict and influence the processes on which national security depends.

He is about itsaidIn the evening, commenting on personnel changes in the NSDC and external intelligence service.

“Thankful Alexei Danilov for his work as secretary of the National Security and Defense Council of Ukraine. He is transferred to another direction - later, ”the head of state said.

According to him, the new Secretary of the NSDCAlexander LitvinenkoIt combines its experience of managing the Foreign Intelligence Service of Ukraine with the tasks that are facing the National Security and Defense Council.

“The new manager of external intelligence has becomeOleg Ivashchenko. He has the appropriate experience. The strengthening of Ukraine and the renewal of our state system in all directions will be continued, ”Volodymyr Zelenskyy added.
title: President explained the change of heads of the National Security and Defense Council and the Foreign Intelligence Service
description: He said this in his evening address, commenting on personnel changes in the National Security and Defense Council and the Service...
author: Army Inform
